content.en: ADC Optimization: Researchers have been exploring various algorithms to improve the performance of analog-to-digital converters (ADCs). These algorithms, such as digital background calibration and foreground calibration, use techniques like signal-dependent dithering and the LMS algorithm to correct errors in ADCs caused by factors like capacitor mismatch and timing skew. By implementing these algorithms, researchers aim to enhance the accuracy and efficiency of ADCs, which are crucial components in many electronic devices.
content.da: ADC-optimering: Forskere har udforsket forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre ydeevnen af analog-til-digital konvertere (ADC'er). Disse algoritmer, såsom digital baggrundskalibrering og forgrundskalibrering, anvender teknikker som signalafhængig dithering og LMS-algoritmen for at korrigere fejl i ADC'er forårsaget af faktorer som kapacitans mismatch og timing skævhed. Ved at implementere disse algoritmer sigter forskerne mod at forbedre nøjagtigheden og effektiviteten af ADC'er, som er afgørende komponenter i mange elektroniske enheder.
